for t in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, l) = [int(x) for x in input().split(' ')]
    S = [int(x) for x in input().split(' ')]
    if n == 1:
        print('Yes')
        continue
    friend = S[-1]
    S = S[:-1]
    best = max(S)
    if friend > best:
        print('Yes')
        continue
    new_speed = friend + k * (l - 1)
    if new_speed > best:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')

from math import ceil
for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, l) = map(int, input().split())
    arr = list(map(int, input().split()))
    if n == 1:
        print('Yes')
        continue
    maxi = max(arr[:len(arr) - 1])
    frnd = arr[-1]
    diff = maxi - frnd
    if diff < 0:
        print('Yes')
        continue
    if k <= 0:
        print('No')
        continue
    diff += 1
    drug = ceil(diff / k)
    if drug < l:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')

for _ in range(int(input())):
    (n, k, l) = map(int, input().split())
    s = list(map(int, input().split()))
    friend = s[n - 1]
    r = 1
    while r < l and k > 0:
        r = r + 1
        friend = friend + k
    s[n - 1] = friend
    ma = max(s)
    if ma == friend and s.count(ma) == 1:
        print('Yes')
    else:
        print('No')
